title: In A Geist Room 10/23: Mookie Betts, Peak COVID, Mitch McConnell, Papa Shaq
itunes:title: In A Geist Room 10/23: Mookie Betts, Peak COVID, Mitch McConnell, Papa Shaq
description:
On this edition of In A Geist Room Jack and Miles discuss the incredible athleticism of Mookie Betts, the US is experiencing peak COVID cases right now, Mitch McConnell looks severely ill, and Shaq is kind of an asshole sometimes!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
